name: Pacific Green Expo
tag_list: recycling, sustainability, green, eco-friendly, cleantech, renewables, environment, events, awards, sustainability-leadership
overview:
The Pacific Green Conference & Expo is a series of events held across the West coast with a focus on best sustainability practices, green products and services. The events are usually a gathering of sustainability-minded business leaders, executives, public officials, academia and other stakeholders from a wide range of industries.

Highlights include:

-Networking opportunities, educational sessions and workshops.

  • Recognition of organizations that have made significant strides in & adapting the best sustainability practices.

-An affordable forum to market your green products and services.

-An exhibition showcasing innovative yet sustainable products and services from startâ€ups and established businesses across numerous industries including transportation, renewable energy, construction, telecommunications, packaging, private equity funding and more. For more information, including sessions, registration, sponsorship and exhibit information, contact the Pacific Green Conference & Expo today!
